Project_ID.label: Project ID
Project_ID.help: The ID of the project as provided by the SAP system, i.e. the WSB-element of the financial system (SAP)

Project_Title.label: Project Title
Project_Title.help: The title of your Research Project

Project_Description.label: Project Description
Project_Description.help: The description of your Research Project

Primary_Investigator.label: Name Principal Investigator(s)
Primary_Investigator.help: The title of your Research Project

PID_Primary_Investigator.label: Persistent Identifier PI (optional)
PID_Primary_Investigator.help: Persitent Identifier PI (e.g. an ORCID, DAI, of ScopusID)

Discipline.label: (Sub) Discipline of research
Discipline.help: (Optional) Categorize your research to a (sub) discipline

Research_type.label: Research type
Research_type.help: (Optional) Categorize your Research Type - e.g. survey study, longitudal panel study, archival study etc.

Ethical_Approval.label: Ethical Approval
Ethical_Approval.help: Has there been ethical approval for this research project?

Approval_By.label: Approval By
Approval_By.help: (Optional) Approving authority, e.g. name of commission

Approval_added.label: Approval Added
Approval_added.help: Has an approval document been added to the datapackage?

Name_approval_doc.label: Name approval document
Name_approval_doc.help: (Optional) What is the name of the added document containing the approval

Funding_Organisation.label: Fundinding Organisation(s)
Funding_Organisation.help: (Optional) The name of the organisation funding your Research Project, e.g. NWO or H2020

Fund_Description.label: Fund Description
Fund_Description.help: (Optional) A description of the organization funding your Research Project

Fund_URL.label: Link website fund
Fund_URL.help: (Optional) A link to the website of the organization funding your Research Project

Funder_Role.label: Role Funder
Funder_Role.help: (Optional) A descrption of the role of the funder, other than an financial, e.g. in offering controlled vocabularies or demands with regards to publicizing data

Study_Purpose.label: Study Purpose
Study_Purpose.help: (Optional) Describe the purpose of the study

Related_Studies.label: Related Studies
Related_Studies.help: (Optional) Studies related to your study - outside the I-lab

URL_Related_Studies.label: Link Related Studies
URL_Related_Studies.help: (Optional) A link to related studies, e.g. a project website

Instrument.label: Instrument(s)
Instrument.help: (Optional) Instrument used for data collection or capture

Instrument_Description.label: Instrument Description
Instrument_Description.help: (Optional) Describe how the instrunent have been used, e.g. settings

PID_Datapackage.label: Persitent Identifier Datapackage
PID_Datapackage.help: Persistent Identifier Datapackage; will be added automatically after archiving the datapackage

Dataset_Type.label: Dataset Type
Dataset_Type.help: What is the type of data in your dataset?

Anonymized.label: Anonymized?
Anonymized.help: Is your dataset anonymized or pseudo-coded?

Version_dataset.label: Version
Version_dataset.help: An autogenerated version number for the dataset

Version_Responsibility.label: Person responsible for version
Version_Responsibility.help: (Optional) The name of the (system) user responsible for this version

Underlying_Dataset.label: Predecessing Dataset
Underlying_Dataset.help: Autogenerated field; is filled when a new version of a dataset is created

Language_dataset.label: Language of data
Language_dataset.help: The language the dataset is in

Owner.label: Owner Data
Owner.help: The person or organisation owning the data

Citation.label: Citation
Citation.help: (Optional) How should this dataset be referred to?

Data_Source.label: Data Source
Data_Source.help: Datasource(s) used for creating the dataset

Start_Collection_Date.label: Start Date Collection Process
Start_Collection_Date.help: Indicate when you've started collecting the data for this dataset

End_Collection_Date.label: End Date Collection Process
End_Collection_Date.help: Indicate when you've finished collecting the data for this dataset

Collection_Method.label: Collection Method
Collection_Method.help: The method used for collecting data

Collection_Method_Description.label: Description Collection Method
Collection_Method_Description.help: A description of the method of collecting data for this dataset

Sample_Size.label: Sample Size
Sample_Size.help: Size of the sample used in the data collection

Name.label: Creator of dataset
Name.help: >The name of the person who created (version of) the dataset

Name.label: Contributor(s) to Dataset
Name.help: >(Optional) The name(s) of the persons who have contributed to this dataset

PI.label: Persistent Identifier Contributor
PI.help: Persitent Identifier contribitor (e.g. an ORCID, DAI, of ScopusID)

Unit_Analysis.label: Unit of Analysis
Unit_Analysis.help: (Optional) Unit of analysis of the dataset

Location_Covered.label: Location(s) covered
Location_Covered.help: Indication of the geographical entities, like countries, regions and cities, covered with this dataset

Start_Period_Dataset.label: Start period
Start_Period_Dataset.help: An indication of the start date of the period covered by your dataset (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

End_Period_Dataset.label: End period
End_Period_Dataset.help: An indication of the end date of the period covered by your dataset (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

Name_Contactperson.label: Contact
Name_Contactperson.help: Name of person or organization which can provide information on the dataset

PID_Contactperson.label: Persistent Identifier Contact
PID_Contactperson.help: (Optional) Persitent Identifier Contactperson (e.g. an ORCID, DAI, of ScopusID)

URL_Contactperson.label: Link webpage contact
URL_Contactperson.help: (Optional) Link to profile page contact person

Contact_Info.label: Contact Info
Contact_Info.help: Contact information of person or organization which can provide information on the dataset, preferably an email address

UU_Dept.label: UU Organisational Unit
UU_Dept.help: In the context of which organizational unit of the UU is the dataset created, e.g. your research group or departement

Tag.label: Tag(s)
Tag.help: (Optional) Free text field for adding (searchable) key words to your dataset

Codes_used.label: Codes used
Codes_used.help: (Optional) Does the dataset contain any (international) codes, e.g. SBI-codes of the CBS, ISO country codes etc.

Codes_Acronym.label: Codes Acronym
Codes_Acronym.help: (Optional) The acronym under which the code(s) is known

URL_Code.label: Link webpage Code
URL_Code.help: (Optional) A link to a webpage describing the coding system(s)

Indicator.label: Indicator
Indicator.help: (Optional) Indicators (variable) used in the dataset. This can be generally acclaimed indicators, e.g. poverty level, or some of the most important variables in your dataset.

Indicator_Acronym.label: Indicator Acronym
Indicator_Acronym.help: (Optional) The acronym used for the indicator(s)

URL_Indicator.label: Link webpage Indicator
URL_Indicator.help: (Optional) A link to a webpage describing the Indicator)s

Number_of_files.label: No. Of Files
Number_of_files.help: The number of files of the datapackage.

Retention_period.label: Retention Period
Retention_period.help: Number of years the data must be kept in the archive

License.label: License
License.help: The license under which you offer the datapackage for use by third parties.

URL_License.label: Link Webpage License
URL_License.help: A link to a webpage describing the license and its conditions

Publish_Dataset.label: Publish Dataset?
Publish_Dataset.help: Do you want to make the dataset available once archived?

Publish_Metadata.label: Publish Metadata?
Publish_Metadata.help: Do you want to make the metadata available in the Data Catalogue?

Archive.label: Archive now?
Archive.help: Do you want to send the dataset to the Archive?

Embargo.label: Embargo?
Embargo.help: If there is an embargo on the Dataset, until what date?

Dataset_Access.label: Dataset access
Dataset_Access.help: Once archived, how is your dataset accessible to third parties?
